languages.text: "Утверждение истинно!" {n}Двое ябед в красном, источающие осуждение, обмениваются исполненными значения и самодовольства кивками.{/n}
"This statement is true!" {n}United in their denunciations and brimming with righteous criticism, the pair in red exchange knowing nods.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно!" {n}Двое ябед в красном, источающие осуждение, обмениваются исполненными значения и самодовольства кивками.{/n}

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt!" {n}Vereint in ihrer Anprangerung und randvoll mit rechtschaffener Kritik, tauscht das Paar ein wissendes Nicken aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true!" {n}United in their denunciations and brimming with righteous criticism, the pair in red exchange knowing nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt!" {n}Vereint in ihrer Anprangerung und randvoll mit rechtschaffener Kritik, tauscht das Paar ein wissendes Nicken aus.{/n}

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte ! » {n}Unis dans leurs dénonciations et exprimant une critique légitime, les deux technoprêtres échangent des signes de tête entendus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true!" {n}United in their denunciations and brimming with righteous criticism, the pair in red exchange knowing nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est correcte ! » {n}Unis dans leurs dénonciations et exprimant une critique légitime, les deux technoprêtres échangent des signes de tête entendus.{/n}

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的！”{n}两位穿着红袍的技术神甫不约而同地开了口，声音中充满正义的意味，互相点头致意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true!" {n}United in their denunciations and brimming with righteous criticism, the pair in red exchange knowing nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的！”{n}两位穿着红袍的技术祭司不约而同地开了口，声音中充满正义的意味，互相点头致意。{/n}

languages.text: 「この言葉はもっともだ！」{n}非難のもとに一致団結し、正当なる批判精神に溢れ、赤い服を着た二人組は互いに相槌を打つ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true!" {n}United in their denunciations and brimming with righteous criticism, the pair in red exchange knowing nods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉はもっともだ！」{n}非難のもとに一致団結し、正当なる批判精神に溢れ、赤い服を着た二人組は互いに相槌を打つ。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Eso es cierto!». {n}Compartiendo la misma desaprobación y rebosantes de crítica moral, la pareja de rojo asiente con complicidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This statement is true!" {n}United in their denunciations and brimming with righteous criticism, the pair in red exchange knowing nods.{/n}

languages.text: "Haklı bir beyan!" {n}İthamlarında mutabık kalan ve haklı eleştirilerini artık içlerinde tutamayan, kırmızılara bürünmüş ikili; birbirlerini onaylar manada başlarını eğiyor.{/n}
